SEARCH
Package peersim.kademlia.operations

Class FindOperation

java.lang.Object
peersim.kademlia.operations.Operation
peersim.kademlia.operations.FindOperation
Direct Known Subclasses:
GetOperation, RandomSamplingOperation
public class FindOperation extends Operation
This class represents a find operation and offer the methods needed to maintain and update the closest set.
It also maintains the number of parallel requsts that can has a maximum of ALPHA.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Daniele Furlan, Maurizio Bonani

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected int
    available_requests
    number of available find request message to send (it must be always less than ALPHA)
    protected HashMap<BigInteger,Boolean>
    closestSet
    This map contains the K closest nodes and corresponding boolean value that indicates if the nodes has been already queried or not
